system.unidentifiedDesc: A slim, smoothly finished stick about 18" (45 cm) long, the wand fits comfortably in one hand. Its surface shows faint runes and hairline veins; one end tapers to a rounded tip while the other terminates in a small carved motif. It feels surprisingly light and balanced.
system.description:
This creates a fireball effect (as if using the magic-user spell) up to 240' away. All victims take 6d6 points of fire damage, but they may make a saving throw vs. wands for half damage.

A slender ebony cylinder etched with crimson runes, pulsing with a subtle warmth and barely contained energy, its surface alive with intricate patterns that hint at something volatile and powerful.
